ConfigurationEntity.InstertPrimaryTableTemplate: insert into 景点评论分页 (PageUrl,标题,景点Code) values(@PageUrl,@标题,@景区Code)
ConfigurationEntity.InstertSubTableTemplate: insert into 景点评论明细(PageUrl, 评论,MID,同步,Jinqqucode) values(@PageUrl,@内容,@MID,0,@景区Code)
ConfigurationEntity.CheckRowInstertPrimaryTable: select 1 from 景点评论分页 where 1<>1
ConfigurationEntity.CheckRowInstertSubTable: select 1 from 景点评论明细 where MID=@MID
